import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
source.a44b7f6c:
def get_outliers(df,numOfOneRowOutlier,features):
    outlier_indices = []
    for col in features:
        Q1 = np.percentile(df[col], 25)
        Q3 = np.percentile(df[col],75)
        IQR = Q3 - Q1
        
        outlier_step = 1.5 * IQR
        outlier_list_col = df[(df[col] < Q1 - outlier_step) | (df[col] > Q3 + outlier_step )].index
        outlier_indices.extend(outlier_list_col)
    outlier_indices = Counter(outlier_indices)   
    print("outlier_indices = ",outlier_indices)
    print("")
    multiple_outliers = list( k for k, v in outlier_indices.items() if v > numOfOneRowOutlier )
    print("multiple_outliers = ",multiple_outliers)
    
    return multiple_outliers
